summary: A Christmas themed player cabin located just south of Nightgate Inn.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/28665-1-1356131267.jpg[/img]

Adds a small Christmas themed player cabin named \"Winter Cabin\" located south of Nightgate Inn. It is on the mouth of the river that flows east towards Windhelm. 

[size=20][color=red]Features[/color][/size]
-Includes Anvil(acts as forge), Alchemy Table, Tanning Rack, and Woodchopping Block
-Multiple Containers for player storage
-Follower Friendly
-Adds a Christmas tree and [color=red]red[/color]/[color=green]green[/color] lanterns in and around the cabin.
-No quests or purchase needed to obtain
-Requires no other mods as it is just items found in vanilla Skyrim

[size=20][color=green]Install[/color][/size]
1) Recomended: Download with Nexus Mod Manager
2) Download Manually, extract files and save them to your Skyrim data folder

[size=20][color=red] Compatibility[/color][/size]
It should be compatible with just about any mod, if you run into a problem please leave a comment so I can try to fix.
author: 811tantan
